text: Xingyang railway station () is a railway station of Longhai railway located in Xingyang, Zhengzhou, Henan, China. The station is currently out of passenger services. == History == The station was opened in 1907. == References == Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Railway stations in Zhengzhou Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1907
title: Xingyang railway station
